Function.Name: Above
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the entity is above the referenced entity in the hierarchy.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate.
The value to compare.

Function.ReturnType: Whether the entity is above the referenced entity in the hierarchy.

Function.Name: AboveOrEqual
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the entity is above or equal to the referenced entity in the hierarchy.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate
The value to compare.

Function.ReturnType: Whether the entity is above or below the referenced entity in the hierarchy.

Function.Name: Between
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the entity is between the referenced entities in the hierarchy.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate.
The values to compare.

Function.ReturnType: Whether the entity is between the referenced entities in the hierarchy.

Function.Name: CalculateRollupField
Function.Description: Calculates the value of a rollup attribute.

Parameters.Parameter: A reference to the entity containing the rollup attribute to calculate.
The logical name of the attribute to calculate.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from the CalculateRollupField function.

Function.Name: CalculateTotalTimeIncident
Function.Description: Calculates the total time, in minutes, that you used while you worked on an incident (case).

Parameters.Parameter: The specified incident record.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from the CaluculateTotalTimeIncident function.

Function.Name: CheckIncomingEmail
Function.Description: Checks whether the incoming email message is relevant to the Microsoft Dynamics CRM system.

Parameters.Parameter: The addresses of the blind carbon copy (Bcc) recipients for the email message.
The addresses of the carbon copy (Cc) recipients for the email message.
For internal use only.
The from address for the email message.
The ID of the email message stored in the email header.
The subject line for the email message.
The addresses of the recipients of the email message.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from the CheckIncomingEmail function.

Function.Name: CheckPromoteEmail
Function.Description: Contains the data that is needed to check whether the incoming email message should be promoted to the Microsoft Dynamics CRM system.

Parameters.Parameter: The direction of a mail checked for promotion for uniqueness.
The message ID that is contained in the email header.
The subject of the message.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from CheckPromoteEmail function.

Function.Name: Contains
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the string contains the specified string.

Parameters.Parameter: The string to evaluate.
The value of the string.

Function.ReturnType: Whether the string contains the specified string.

Function.Name: DownloadReportDefinition
Function.Description: Downloads a report definition.

Parameters.Parameter: The report definition record.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from DownloadReportDefinition function

Function.ReturnType: Whether the value is equal to the specified business ID.

the start of the period to expand.

Function.Name: ExportFieldTranslation

Function.Description: Retrieves all the time zone definitions for the specified locale and to return only the display name attribute.

Parameters.Parameter: The data needed to retrieve all the time zone definitions.
The locale ID

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the GetAllTimeZonesWithDisplayName function.

Function.Name: GetDefaultPriceLevel
Function.Description: Retrieves the default price level (price list) for the current user based on the user’s territory relationship with the price level.

Parameters.Parameter: For internal use only.
The price level (price list) for the current user. If a user territory is part of multiple price levels (price lists), includes multiple price levels (price lists).

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from the GetDefaultPriceLevel function.

Function.Name: GetDistinctValuesImportFile
Function.Description: Retrieves distinct values from the parse table for a column in the source file that contains list values.

Parameters.Parameter: A column number in the CSV, XML Spreadsheet 2003 (.xml), or text source file for which the distinct values are returned. Required.
The import file that is associated with the source file. Required.
The page number in the source file. Required.
The number of data records per page in the source file. Required.

Function.ReturnType: The response from this function.

Function.Name: GetHeaderColumnsImportFile
Function.Description: Retrieves the source-file column headings; or retrieve the system-generated column headings if the source file does not contain column headings.

Parameters.Parameter: The import file that is associated with the parse table. Required.

Function.ReturnType: The response from this function.

Function.Name: GetQuantityDecimal
Function.Description: Gets the quantity decimal value of a product for the specified entity in the target.

The product to retrieve.
The unit of measure (

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the GetValidReferencedEntities function.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the primary entity in the relationship

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the GetValidReferencingEntities function.

Function.Name: QueryMultipleSchedules
Function.Description: Searches multiple resources for available time block that match the specified parameters.

Parameters.Parameter: The end time for the scheduled block of time.
The resoure.
The start time for the scheduled block of time.
The time codes to look for: Available, Busy, Unavailable, or Filter, which correspond to the resource IDs

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from QueryMultipleSchedules function.

Function.Name: QuerySchedule
Function.Description: Searches the specified resource for an available time block that matches the specified parameters.

Parameters.Parameter: The end time for the scheduled block of time.
The resource.
The start time for the scheduled block of time.
The time codes to look for: Available, Busy, Unavailable, or Filter, which correspond to the resource IDs

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from the QuerySchedule function.

Function.Name: RetrieveOrganizationResources
Function.Description: Retrieves the resources that are used by an organization.
Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveOrganizationResources function.

Function.Name: RetrieveParentGroupsResourceGroup
Function.Description: Retrieves the collection of the parent resource groups of the specified resource group (scheduling group).

Parameters.Parameter: The ID of the specified group.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveParentGroupsResourceGroup function.

Function.Name: RetrieveParsedDataImportFile
Function.Description: Retrieves the data from the parse table.

Parameters.Parameter: ID of the import file that is associated with the parse table.
The paging information for the retrieved data.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveParsedDataImportFile function.

Functions.Function:
Retrieves pages of posts, including comments for each post, for all records that the calling user is following.
The number of comments per post. The end date and time of the posts that you want to retrieve The RetrievePersonalWall Function is bound to the mscrm.post entity set A specific page of posts that is designated by its page number The number of posts per page The source of the post. The start date and time of the posts that you want to retrieve. Reserved for future use. the Contains the results from the RetrievePersonalWall function.

Function.Name: RetrievePrincipalAccess
Function.Description: Retrieves the access rights of the specified security principal (team or user) to the specified record.

Parameters.Parameter: The specified user entity.
The target record for which to retrieve access rights.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrievePrincipalAccess function.

Function.Name: RetrievePrincipalAttributePrivileges
Function.Description: Retrieves all the secured attribute privileges a user or team has through direct or indirect (through team membership) associations with the FieldSecurityProfile entity.

Parameters.Parameter: The record to retrieve the privileges for.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results of the RetrievePrincipalAttributePrivileges function.

Function.Name: RetrievePrincipalSyncAttributeMappings
Function.Description: For internal use only.

Parameters.Parameter: For internal use only.

Function.ReturnType: For internal use only.

Function.Name: RetrievePrivilegeSet
Function.Description: Retrieves the set of privileges defined in the system.

Parameters.Parameter: NA function bound to collection

Function.ReturnType: A collection of privileges

Function.Name: RetrieveProductProperties
Function.Description: Retrieve all the property instances (dynamic property instances) for a product added to an opportunity, quote, order, or invoice.

Parameters.Parameter: RetrieveProductProperties Function is bound to opportunityproduct, quotedetail, salesorderdetail, and invoicedetail

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveProductProperties function.

Function.Name: RetrieveProvisionedLanguagePackVersion
Function.Description: Retrieves the version of a provisioned language pack.

Parameters.Parameter: The locale Id for the language.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveProvisionedLanguagePackVersion function.

Function.Name: RetrieveProvisionedLanguages
Function.Description: Retrieves the list of provisioned languages.
Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveProvisionedLanguages function.

Function.Name: RetrieveRecordWall
Function.Description: Retrieves pages of posts, including comments for each post, for a specified record.

Parameters.Parameter: The number of comments per post.
The end date and time of the posts to retrieve.
The record for which to retrieve the wall.

Function.Name: RetrieveRequiredComponents
Function.Description: Retrieves a collection of solution components that are required for a solution component.

Parameters.Parameter: The solution component.
The ID of the solution component that you want to check.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveRequiredComponents function.

Function.Name: RetrieveRolePrivilegesRole
Function.Description: Retrieves the privileges that are assigned to the specified role.

Parameters.Parameter: The specified role to retrieve the privileges for.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveRolePrivilegesRole function.

Function.Name: RetrieveSubGroupsResourceGroup
Function.Description: Retrieves the collection of child resource groups from the specified resource group.

Parameters.Parameter: The record to retrieve the child resource groups from.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveSubGroupsResourceGroup function.

Function.Name: RetrieveSubsidiaryTeamsBusinessUnit
Function.Description: Retrieves a collection of entity instances based on the specified query criteria. (Deprecated)

Parameters.Parameter: The specified query criteria.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveSubsidiaryTeamsBusinessUnit function.

Function.Name: RetrieveSubsidiaryUsersBusinessUnit
Function.Description: Retrieves all user information from the child business units of the specified business unit. (Deprecated)

Parameters.Parameter: The specified record to retrieve the information from.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveSubsidiaryUsersBusinessUnit function.

Function.Name: RetrieveTeamPrivileges
Function.Description: Retrieves the privileges for a team.

Parameters.Parameter: The record to retrieve the privileges for.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveTeamPrivileges function.

Function.Name: RetrieveTeamsSystemUser
Function.Description: Retrieves the list of teams of which the specified user is a member.

Parameters.Parameter: The specified user record.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveTeamsSystemUser function.

Function.Name: RetrieveTimestamp
Function.Description: Retrieves a time stamp for the metadata.
Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the the RetrieveTimestamp function.

Function.Name: RetrieveUserPrivileges

Whether the response should include public queues.

Function.Name: RetrieveUserSettingsSystemUser

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the RetrieveUserSettingsSystemUser function.

Function.Name: RetrieveVersion
Function.Description: Retrieves the version number of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM Server.

Function.Name: Search
Function.Description: Searches for available time slots that fulfill the specified appointment request.

Parameters.Parameter: The appointment request.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the results from the Search function.

Function.Name: SearchByBodyKbArticle
Function.Description: Searches for knowledge base articles that contain the specified body text.

Parameters.Parameter: SearchByBodyKbArticle Function is bound to the kbarticle entity collection
The title in the articles
Subject for the knowledge base article
Indicates whether to use inflectional stem matching when you search for knowledge base articles by a specific title.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from SearchByBodyKbArticle function.

Function.Name: SearchByKeywordsKbArticle
Function.Description: Searches for knowledge base articles that contain the specified keywords.

Parameters.Parameter: SearchByKeywordsKbArticle Function is bound to the kbarticle entity collection
The title in the articles
Subject for the knowledge base article
Indicates whether to use inflectional stem matching when you search for knowledge base articles by a specific title.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from the SearchByKeywordsKbArticle function.

Function.Name: SearchByTitleKbArticle
Function.Description: Searches for knowledge base articles that contain the specified title.

Parameters.Parameter: SearchByTitleKbArticle Function is bound to the kbarticle entity collection
The title in the articles
Subject for the knowledge base article
Indicates whether to use inflectional stem matching when you search for knowledge base articles by a specific title.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from theSearchByTitleKbArticle function

Function.Name: ThisFiscalPeriod
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the value is within the current fiscal period.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate.

Function.ReturnType: Whether the date is within the current fiscal period.

Function.Name: ThisFiscalYear
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the value is within the current fiscal year.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate.

Function.ReturnType: Whether the date is within the current fiscal year.

Function.Name: ThisMonth
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the value is within the current month.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate

Function.ReturnType: Whether the date is within the current month.

Function.Name: ThisWeek
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the value is within the current week.

Parameters.Parameter: The property to evaluate

Function.ReturnType: Whether the date is within the current week.

Function.Name: ThisYear
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the value is within the current year.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate

Function.ReturnType: Whether the date is within the current year.

Function.Name: Today
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the value equals today’s date.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate

Function.ReturnType: Whether the date equals today’s date.

Function.Name: Tomorrow
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the value equals tomorrow’s date.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate.

Function.ReturnType: Whether the date equals tomorrow’s date

Function.Name: Under
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the entity is below the referenced record in the hierarchy.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate
The value to compare

Function.ReturnType: Whether the entity is below the referenced record in the hierarchy

Function.Name: UnderOrEqual
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the entity is under or equal to the referenced entity in the hierarchy.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate.
The value to compare.

Function.ReturnType: Whether the entity is under or equal to the referenced entity in the hierarchy.

Function.Name: ValidateRecurrenceRule
Function.Description: Validates a rule for a recurring appointment.

Parameters.Parameter: The recurrence rule record to validate.

Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from the ValidateRecurrenceRule function.

Function.Name: WhoAmI
Function.Description: Retrieves system information for the currently logged on user.
Function.ReturnType: Contains the response from the WhoAmI function.

Function.Name: Yesterday
Function.Description: Query function that evaluates whether the entity is under or equal to the referenced entity in the hierarchy.

Parameters.Parameter: The name of the property to evaluate.

Function.ReturnType: Whether the entity is under or equal to the referenced entity in the hierarchy.
